document.full_text: carla bruni-sarkozy arrived at the group of eight summit meeting in deauville, france, on thursday and made no effort to hide her rounded belly as she posed for photographs.
document.title: in french first lady, a rumor takes shape
lines_and_colors: carla bruni-sarkozy arrived at the group of eight summit meeting in deauville, france, on thursday and made no effort to hide her rounded belly as she posed for photographs.
